name: Enter the glockchain
description:
Do you dislike NFTs? 

Would you like to hunt down crypto-chimps and harvest their jpegs in a video game?

Well now you can in "Enter the glockchain", an FPS about twitch aim reflexes and shortest path traversal. 

Check the game folder after for a prize! 

music credit due to: Captain Qubz for their track "Get Down" provided royalty free.

also the game is pretty buggy as you might expect from a game jam game.
